mapper.insert: insert into users (email, name, phone, profileImage, addr, departmentId, team, gender, position, password, loginId) values (#{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{profileImage}, #{addr}, #{departmentId}, #{team}, #{gender}, #{position}, #{password}, #{loginId})
mapper.select: select u.*, d.name as departmentName from users as u join department as d on u.departmentId = d.id where u.id = #{id}
select * from users where loginId = #{loginId} and isDeleted = 0

SELECT loginId FROM users ORDER BY loginId DESC LIMIT 1
